entry.title: [RBX8][DedicatedServers] - Rack R806L20
entry.content:
Oct 20, 16:20 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/10/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack R806L20 are over-heating or no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
